Params: {3: 'Murray has already disassembled the large terminal in the archives and connected cables of various sizes to a peculiar-looking module.'}
{3: 'He looks at the jerry-rigged bionic access terminal and smiles wryly.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Murray', 3: 'Looks like this is the only place to infiltrate Gestalt without being detected.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: "Gestalt is limited by the principal protocols, so it won't intentionally inflict fatal damage to a human consciousness...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: 'But who can be sure that Gestalt is still its former self after having evolved for so long?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Murray sighs as he puts the mask-shaped bionic access terminal on his face.'}
{3: 'Upon doing so, Murray is removed from all his senses as his consciousness falls into a vortex of emptiness.'}
{3: "There is only one thought left in Murray's mind as he falls."}
{2: 'Murray', 3: "If this is what you feel... what Constructs feel when they dive in, then, Lee... I don't envy you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: "...If I had a choice between infiltrating Gestalt and negotiating with some strange Ascendant, I'd probably choose the latter."}
{3: 'The vortex subsides and Murray finds himself "once again" in Babylonia.'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: 'While Gestalt is busy dealing with the intruder and the Gray Ravens...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: "I'll see what secrets I can uncover here.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: 'But before I do, I need to be prepared.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Murray reaches out with both hands toward where he entered, and he opens his hands as if calling upon something—'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: 'Start the full band lockdown procedure and activate safe mode for this block.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: "This will deactivate the normal immersion disengagement procedure, but that shouldn't be an issue for you, Lee.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: "...Let's see how Commander Nikola's minions will react.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: 'After all... only by activating the security mode can I cover my tracks.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Asimov points at the screen, which displays a lit-up dot hovering around "Core S-4-2".'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "That shouldn't be there. That floor is highly isolated—it shouldn't be accessible to external entries...", 4: '2'}
{3: 'While they are busy figuring out the source of the signal, the screen turns blank right before their eyes.'}
{3: 'And then, the screen displays a massive warning: "Connection rejected."'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Then add X-K-6 and bridge it directly to Gestalt's maintenance interface!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'This is not an external problem. All interfaces have been disconnected internally.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'It seems like... no one but those already inside can tell what the internal situation of Gestalt is right now.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'All we can do is maintain power and give them a chance to disengage.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Asimov, we're going to the bridge in the virtual space.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Well then, all we can do is keep moving.', 3: '72'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Right. Let's focus on our mission... We'll figure out the rest later.", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'The main intrusion terminal is under threat. Proceeding intrusions cannot be guaranteed.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "...That's enough. Withdraw the main intrusion terminal as soon as possible. Since it's about to fail, there's no reason to tangle with them any further.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'That will take some time. I will need to withdraw all the data uploaded to Gestalt through each external port to prevent them from tracing the source and each bridge contact.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: 'Our mission to crash Babylonia has failed. Have everyone maintain defensive positions and retreat in my direction.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "Don't fall into their trap. Maintain an orderly retreat.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'α', 3: 'Gabriel and Roland both "took a detour" on their way to their destinations.', 4: '1'}
